title: Stardew Valley: How to Rotate Furniture on All Platforms

steps.title: Select the item.
steps.content: Select the item. Make sure you're standing next to where you want to place the furniture. [1] X Research source PC : Left-click Nintendo Switch : Y Xbox : X PlayStation : Square Mobile : tap the item If you need to move the furniture first, use the mouse, right joystick, or touch to do so. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Rotate the furniture.
steps.content: Rotate the furniture. It's best to place furniture in a way that doesn't block players from entering rooms or using interactive items, such as chests. If you place chairs in a certain direction, your character will face accordingly when seated. [3] X Research source PC : Right-click Nintendo Switch : A Xbox : A PlayStation : X Mobile : tap the item once Some furniture cannot be rotated, such as paintings, some equipment, and other front-facing furniture.

steps.title: Place the furniture.
steps.content: Place the furniture. The new location will be set. PC : Left-click Nintendo Switch : Y Xbox : X PlayStation : Square Mobile : tap the location If you've finished the Community Center in Stardew Valley , there are ways to make more money . These funds can help furnish your house for your future spouse and, if desired, kids .
